channel.title: Whats wrong with this code? [PI]
channel.description:
In ActionHandler.java, under [code]firstClickNpc[/code] I put [code]case 6138: c.getDH().sendDialogues(20, npcType); break;[/code] And i get the error [code]src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1058: variable npcType mig ht not have been initialized c.getDH().sendDialogues(420, npc Type); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ClickingButtons.java:1069: variable npcType mig ht not have been initialized c.getDH().sendDialogues(260, npcType); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code] When I compile.
I will be out so I wont reply for 1 or 2 hours.
Thanks
[size=36pt]FIXED FIXED[/size]

item.title: Whats wrong with this code? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @FuZzIoN FuZzIoN
item.description:
@FuZzIoN wrote:

[quote=“DannyC, post:2, topic:411155”]case 6138: c.getDH().sendDialogues(20, npcType); break;Try that.[/quote]

Still wont work.

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:3, topic:411155”]What’s your senddialouge method?[/quote] What do you mean?
But this is the code for DialogueHandler.java is;

sendNpcChat4("Hello there "+c.playerName+"!"," I have the ability to reset your combat stats for free!","But remember, this is irreversable!","What would you like me to do?", c.talkingNpc, "Town Crier"); c.nextChat = 21; break; case 210: sendOption4("Reset Defence", "Reset Prayer", "Reset Attack", "Reset All Combat Stats"); c.dialogueAction = 42; break; case 230: sendNpcChat2("Congratulations!", "Your defence has been completely reset!",c.talkingNpc, "Town Crier"); c.nextChat = 0; break; case 240: sendNpcChat2("Congratulations!", "Your attack has been completely reset!",c.talkingNpc, "Town Crier"); c.nextChat = 0; break; case 250: sendNpcChat2("Congratulations!", "Your combat stats have been completely reset!",c.talkingNpc, "Town Crier"); c.nextChat = 0; break; case 260: sendNpcChat2("Congratulations!","Your prayer have been completely reset!",c.talkingNpc, "Town Crier"); c.nextChat = 0; break;

Read full topic

item.title: Whats wrong with this code? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Either declare npcType before the case Id, or just replace it with a random number >.>

Read full topic
